resources.string: Oops something went wrong. Check your network connection and try again.
The request has been completed successfully.
The resource has been created successfully.
The server cannot process the request.
Your credentials are not valid.
Payment required before completing the action.
The action is not allowed.
The request has not been defined on the server.
The method used for this request is not allowed.
It is not allowed to return the data in the form that has been required.
The server took too long to respond.
The request is no longer supported by server. It has been recently removed.
The request is too long and the server refuses to respond.
The request is too long and the server refuses to respond.
Request format not supported by the server.
The server has blocked access to the data that has been requested.
The server is busy at the moment. Please try again later.
An internal server error has occurred.
The server does not support the requested action.
An external error has occurred on the server, so it cannot respond properly.
The server is down. Maybe due to maintenance.
One of the external servers took too long to respond.
The server does not support the HTTP protocol used for this request.
